thread.title: Exclusive: Aberdeen star Jonny Hayes set to sign new deal
thread.title_full: Exclusive: Aberdeen star Jonny Hayes set to sign new deal

title: Exclusive: Aberdeen star Jonny Hayes set to sign new deal
text:
Exclusive: Aberdeen star Jonny Hayes set to sign new deal ABERDEEN are set to tie up Jonny Hayes on a new deal. PUBLISHED: 00:14,  20,   Jonny Hayes is set to sign a new deal with Aberdeen 
Cardiff had three bids turned down, and Championship rivals Wigan had a £750,000 offer kicked out on deadline day. 
The 29-year-old winger is out of contract at the end of next season, but is set for a wage rise when he pens the extension. 
The Pittodrie outfit hope to finalise talks over the next 48 hours on a deal that will tie Hayes to the club until at least 2019, although they will push for even longer. The Dons had held negotiations with Hayes earlier this year which stalled. Stars   
But there now appears to be a willingness on all sides to come to an agreement. 
McInnes will hold talks with a number of his out-of-contract players over the next week as he starts preparations for the summer transfer market. 
Skipper Ryan Jack, Niall McGinn, Ash Taylor, Peter Pawlett and Andrew Considine could all leave at the end of the season if new deals aren’t agreed. Related articles
